description:
MUJO is a unique puzzle game with features that can't be found in any other game. Start stacking tiles and tap on them to attack monsters!

You won't be able to stop playing! Play whenever you want, as much as you want.

= How to play =
Stack three or more connected sword tiles by tapping and holding one of the tiles.
The more tiles you stack together, the stronger your attack power!
By tapping on a tile of three or more swords, you can attack and defeat the monsters!
Monsters of the Greek myths will appear one after the other. Try to defeat them!

= Add gods to your party! =
You may find a variety of Greek gods in treasure chests that can be found in the game once in while! They can be your allies. Use the gods' abilities and win against all the monsters that will appear in front of you.

= Features =
Easy but profound game development.
A puzzle system you have never experienced before.
Many cool gods and monsters designed by HEY.
Beautiful but minimal graphic design and animation.
name: MUJO
